channel.title: Messages on YWallet
channel.description: Recent content in Messages on YWallet

item.title: Message List
item.description: Messages are contained in the memo field. Whenever you send to a shielded address, you can attach some data through the memo. Memos have a maximum size of 512 bytes which is enough in most cases. Message List Avatar of the Sender or Recipient. The color depends on their initial Sender or Receiver and the direction (out/in) Date/Time Subject. Unread messages are shown in bold Content Tap to send a new message Message Table The Message Table is shown if you have selected it in the settings.

item.title: Message Details
item.description: Navigation Go to the previous message in same thread (i.e. same subject) Go to the previous message Go to the next message Go to the next message in same thread (i.e. same subject) Reply If the message has a sender, click on this button to reply to it. It will open a send dialog box with the subject and recipient prepopulated.

item.title: Send a Message
item.description: Send Sending a message is done through the regular “Send YEC/ZEC” dialog box. Check if you want to include your address Subject Body You can also attach some coins with the message.

item.title: Settings
item.description: Settings The only new setting for Messages is the option to include your address by default. If enabled, the send dialog box will have this option pre-checked.

item.title: Internal Format
item.description: In order to support messages with subject and sender, YWallet formats the memo field in a particular way.
